title: Thief: Deadly Shadows

title: Thief: Deadly Shadows
notes: Game launches without issue, but mouse cursor is mostly invisible (flickers visibly in certain areas of the screen), making it very difficult to navigate the options menu or the pre-mission screens. In-game works 100% (except for when tips pop up, which makes the cursor flicker). Tried disabling esync and in-game vsync to no effect.
Played Flawlessly. If only we can play in widescreen resolution :(
